title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically. This issue needs to be addressed.
OB: When running the Control Example, resize the window vertically only. It can be observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The flashing issue should be resolved so that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames needs to be repainted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Launch the Control Example.  
2. Resize the window vertically.  
3. Observe the excessive flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
